Integration Collaterals

Integration Collaterals

EdCast LXP platform provides multiple integration options to integrate Users, Security and Content deployment of the customers. This document provides comprehensive overview all the integration options.

  • HRIS Integration
  • SSO Integration
  • LMS Integration
  • Content Integration

HRIS Integration

Name         Link         Description
Generic HRIS         HRIS-Integration.pdf         This documents describes all the HRIS integration options supported by EdCast LXP platform.
WorkDay         WorkDay-Integration.pdf         This documents describes the support for Workday HRIS system by EdCast LXP platform.
SuccessFactors         SuccessFactors-Integration.pdf         This documents describes the support for SuccessFactors HRIS system by EdCast LXP platform.

SABA         SABA-Integration.pdf         This documents describes the support for SABA LMS system by EdCast LXP platform.
CornerStone         CornerStone-Integration.pdf         This documents describes the support for CornerStone LMS system by EdCast LXP platform
